tiles.name: Markdown
tiles.markdown:
## How to use this dashboard.

Please use this dashboard and filter the management zone in the top right to the account that you wish to target.

This doesn't provide much value if you scope it to all accounts against the environment.

The CloudFront metrics report on all the distributions in the account, so you'll need to make sure you're looking at the appropriate CFN infront of your FE/BE relative to what you've got deployed.
